text: Jose Claveria de Venecia Jr. (born December 26, 1936) is a former Speaker of the House of Representatives of the Philippines serving from 1992 to 1998 and from 2001 to 2008. He ran for president in the 1998 election but lost to Vice President Joseph Estrada, finishing second among 11 candidates. ==References== ==Other websites== *The biography of Jose de Venecia Jr. *The official website of Jose de Venecia Jr. *The official website of the Philippine House of Representatives Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the House of Representatives of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Ilocos
title: Jose de Venecia Jr.
